website_summaries.verdict: Customers wanting the option to purchase a single plastic shopping basket will find their match in this durable product.
pros: Long-lasting polyethylene basket provides durability to product
Wire handles showcase cushioned pads, ensuring hand comfort
cons: Many customers had issues with the basket arriving dirty and grimy

customer_reviews.title: Dirty Basket
customer_reviews.text: One Star Rating at Amazon means "I hate it." And there certainly are things to hate. The basket arrived quite dirty, all over. Black dirt. I paid $23 to get a very dirty basket that must be cleaned. And keep in mind that with all the openings, it is not that easy to clean completely. A lot of surface to wipe, with lots of spaces in between. There is a white adhesive label on the side. You guessed it. It won't peel off easy. And it will leave crap residue. This company says in the description that these baskets have "cushioned grips." They're plastic, just in case anyone reads that and thinks otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: IBuyALot OnAmazonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: This basket is EXACTLY what I wanted.....it is well made and fits into my shopping cart perfectly. I'm a senior citizen and this prevents me from having to use a supermarket's shopping cart. I wheel my own cart right into the store, place the items I wish to purchase in my new handy-andy basket, unload at the checkout. No bending or having to lift heavy items....just perfect. BTW, I printed the Amazon sales receipt and created "Property of (MY NAME)" so that I won't be accused of stealing the basket from the store. I choose the color green because most of the stores have either black or red.
customer_reviews.author: Honor

customer_reviews.title: good handles) if they hadn't stuck a cheap label on ...
customer_reviews.text: The basket would have gotten a 5 (big enough, decent construction, good handles) if they hadn't stuck a cheap label on the side which will not come off. I'm sick of overpaying for new merchandise, only to have it arrive and require my time, effort and supplies to try to make it actually functional. Twenty minutes with a bottle of Goo Gone and the residue remains on this new basket. Just... tired of it.
customer_reviews.author: derring dodette

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, but Dirty
customer_reviews.text: The handles have a plastic tube/protector/weight distributor to help keep your hand from being hurt by the weight of the basket pressing into your flesh. This is an improvement over what is shown in the product picture. The basket arrived with a film of dirt covering the entire product. It looked dingy and I had to clean it off by scrubbing the entire surface. If you just order one basket that is not too bad, but if you order many of them it would be a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: David Albert Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased, and Perfectly clean.
customer_reviews.text: Received mine on 2-18-18. Was a bit concerned about the comments I read about the baskets being filthy with stickers that were not removable. I either got lucky, or they are listening. Mine is spotless but it had a 1x1 1/2 inch sticker on the inside wall that was very easy to peel off. Very pleased with this purchase, Now I do not have to roll a cart to get a couple of items at the stores.
customer_reviews.author: David M

customer_reviews.title: Reduce exposure to germs and use of bags at the supermarket. Size is big!
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful, arrived before it was scheduled to, and is awesome. Many others on Amazon are not as big as this one, so pay attention to dimensions when purchasing. Perfect if you don't like to touch random baskets or want to eliminate the use of grocery bags. My only wish is that it was made of recycled and/or recyclable plastic. I recommend this product. Also, fits great as storage in my car. BTW Review is for Winholt LSB-1BK Customer Shopping Super Sani-Basket, 13" x 19" x 10" Size, Black.
customer_reviews.author: Flora

customer_reviews.title: Dirty Basket
customer_reviews.text: One Star Rating at Amazon means "I hate it." And there certainly are things to hate. The basket arrived quite dirty, all over. Black dirt. I paid $23 to get a very dirty basket that must be cleaned. And keep in mind that with all the openings, it is not that easy to clean completely. A lot of surface to wipe, with lots of spaces in between. There is a white adhesive label on the side. You guessed it. It won't peel off easy. And it will leave crap residue. This company says in the description that these baskets have "cushioned grips." They're plastic, just in case anyone reads that and thinks otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: IBuyALot OnAmazonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Bring Your Own In + Out
customer_reviews.text: Well built sturdy basket with metal handles and plastic grips that is as big as most of them in stores, but with out the public germs, just mine, on the handles. With store plastic bags getting thinner, this became an obvious choice.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Sonic

customer_reviews.title: Fits right on top of my rolly cart!
customer_reviews.text: This fits right into my rolly cart and is a bit different from the stores baskets so they know I didn't steal a basket. I bought 2, they were on a special and now I always have a great basket for stuff.
customer_reviews.author: islander

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I bought it, I'm glad it comes in colors that are different than the supermarket's. If the supermarket sold the ones they had, I would not have needed to buy one, but they don't, so I did.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Landry

customer_reviews.title: Great basket! So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This product came directly and promptly from the seller. It is just as the seller describes, durable and sturdy! I bought it with the intent to use it in the garden. As I collect veggies, I can hose em down right in the basket! Works well :)
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Just I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Whit COVID-19, all the Markets by me have taken away the baskets for use. I saw someone bring their own and though that's a great idea! Well made and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: Great basket for my purpose
customer_reviews.text: My main household grocery storage is in my basement. I was regularly bringing up armloads of products for cooking. I realized I needed to shop my basement pantry, and what better way than with a grocery basket. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Fits in my walker
customer_reviews.text: Due to Covid, they would not give me a shopping basket at the market. So I bought my own and it is perfect! Keep it in the hallway, bring trash to chute, etc. Very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Nats Lady

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This basket is well made and very useful. I use it to carry various things such as books, cleaning supplies, towels, bottles, clothes from floor to floor in my house. It's lightweight and larger than expected. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: nemo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, nice size
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to replace cheap grocery bags when I carry stuff up from pantry and down. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jean H.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like the grocery store
customer_reviews.text: Needed it as a prop for a photo shoot and it was perfect. It was as sturdy as the ones from the grocery store. Doesn't have any extra grip on the handles like the grocery store ones, but it's certainly still quality and good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Selena H

customer_reviews.title: Great for easy grocery transport
customer_reviews.text: I shop with two of these at the local grocer. Makes it so easy to transport the groceries to the car and into the house.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie2503

customer_reviews.title: Clean and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived. Looks and feels sturdy. Nice size. Whatever the problem with dirt was mentioned by a couple reviewers had been solved. Mine is very clean.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn D. Mack

customer_reviews.title: USED and scuffed up :(
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed- I paid for a new basket and a crummy, used looking one was shipped. It even has a slight crack in the plastic rectangular area near the top.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Good little basket.
customer_reviews.text: Given to a friend to help her organize and move around bath items. Worked well.
customer_reviews.author: BettyB

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up, Great
customer_reviews.text: My being in a wheelchair limits what I buy at the store but this basket is a game changer for me.
customer_reviews.author: Burrell Lee Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. The plastic basket is Big
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. The plastic basket is Big, Very Strong and light weight. Can't go wrong for the $9. I very happy with this item. I use it in my garden to load and carry all my vegetables. I am a rough on things and this basket stands up to everything I do.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B

customer_reviews.title: No more plastic bags for me
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. No more using those plastic bags or reusable bags for me. Larger basket size than what stores carry. Means I can shop more with less trips to the store. Definitely comes in handy for persons using a wheelchair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy with this! Good quality and the protection on the handles is great. I’m an older customer who dreaded carrying boxes up and down the stairs. Now I can have one hand on the banister.
customer_reviews.author: dianel

customer_reviews.title: Super market quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is great when using my walker. Makes shopping and other chores easier.
customer_reviews.author: Chief

customer_reviews.title: Nice basket
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was a little larger than I had in mind but turned out better than I thought. Nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: MellowRose

customer_reviews.title: Garden Use
customer_reviews.text: I use my basket to collect veggies from my garden!
customer_reviews.author: D. A. B.

customer_reviews.title: very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely on my walker to help a senior citizen do a little grocery shopping.
customer_reviews.author: DeepBlue

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: No stickers, no residue, no smell, just a good quality basket.
customer_reviews.author: Donald T.

customer_reviews.title: Right size
customer_reviews.text: This is what the grocery stores have/had. The SaveMart chain has discontinued their baskets because customers were stealing them. People have asked where I got mine and I tell them to check Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: jbevins@pacbell.net

customer_reviews.title: Price is too high
customer_reviews.text: Every time I purchase something amazon increases the price shortly after I make a purchase
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Dirty on Delivery - Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened my box from Amazon, I found a very dirty yellow basket. It appears it may have sat in a warehouse for years, accumulating grime that requires lots of scrubbing to remove. Hosing it down will not be sufficient. I have tried cleaning it somewhat, but it's more work than I expected - getting into all of the crevices. Will return. Very disappointed as I wanted to use this in my classroom for color-coded recess equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Linebacker

customer_reviews.title: I use this as a Produce harvester
customer_reviews.text: I use this to harvest garden produce. Red is my favorite color and I bought a yellow one for my neighbor. Very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: TTC

customer_reviews.title: Very clean and good
customer_reviews.text: You can put alot in this very sturdy highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ray miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: With the new ban on bags, and my dislike for the other options - this is perfect for grocery shopping and keeps item organized. Easy to stack and useful for other needs
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect carryall basket
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted something to carry items downstairs and this basket was the perfect size with hinged handles to do the job. A little pricey but seems to be worth it, by its sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Luedtke

customer_reviews.title: handles work just fine and i am very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special--it arrived as promised and was as described--sturdy, handles work just fine and i am very pleased with it.,
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: As Described
customer_reviews.text: This is a handheld shopping cart. I use it to carry recycled water. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Paratopia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent basket!
customer_reviews.text: The biggest I've found. Plus by having the holes cut out, it is actually pretty light weight. But it's still very sturdy. I'd recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dewed

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. A little bigger then expected. Use for my craft supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Helped me so much bringing food in from the outside fridge-I finally don’t drop food while bringing it inside :)
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Basket, cause they banned bags.
customer_reviews.text: Do you want to hear, "OMG where did you get that, I want one?!?!" Then get this.
customer_reviews.author: modmic3000

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For my dog. It fits right into the top of my shopping basket cart
customer_reviews.author: Christine Goldman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Basket
customer_reviews.text: Awesome basket! Got this so I could carry multiple lunches and drinks from one building to another. I put a large rubber band in cross corners to slip around the cups and hold them in place and put some rubber type shelf liner n the bottom to keep food from sliding. Plenty of room, easier for my arthritic hands to carry
customer_reviews.author: Laura Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: however cleaned up easily and works as expected
customer_reviews.text: was filthy on receipt, however cleaned up easily and works as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Strickler

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Much better than a bag or relying on the stores to have these available.
customer_reviews.author: Spinoza

customer_reviews.title: Great as a garden basket
customer_reviews.text: Works great...using it as a garden basket for big harvests. Can even wash produce in the basket outside with the hose.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Roth

customer_reviews.title: nice baskets, maybe not as tough as the ones ...
customer_reviews.text: nice baskets, maybe not as tough as the ones you'll find in the grocery store but suit my purposes perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

product_meta.title: Winholt LSB-1BK Customer Shopping Super Sani-Basket, 13" x 19" x 10" Size, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackGreat for deli’s, c-stores, supermarkets and retail operations for customer convenience.
feature_bullets: Heavy duty, durable, washable polyethylene. Constructed with reinforced ribbing for strength and steel plated wire handles that are stronger than plastic
The cushioned grips offer comfort while carrying the baskets
